step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM ZONE_LINK_MESH P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM ZONE_LINK P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(P.GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE');

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_NODE (PID) (SELECT NODE_PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.NODE_PID FROM ZONE_NODE_MESH M, (SELECT NODE_PID FROM ZONE_NODE_MESH WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]) N WHERE N.NODE_PID = M.NODE_PID GROUP BY N.NODE_PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1) );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_FACE (PID) ( SELECT DISTINCT FT.FACE_PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.PID FROM ZONE_LINK_MESH M, TEMP_ZONE_LINK N WHERE N.PID = M.LINK_PID GROUP BY N.PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1) T, ZONE_FACE_TOPO FT WHERE T.PID = FT.LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_LINK (PID) (SELECT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_FACE P, ZONE_FACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_LINK (PID) (SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM ZONE_LINK L WHERE L.S_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_NODE) UNION ALL SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM ZONE_LINK L WHERE L.E_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_NODE) );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_FACE (PID) (SELECT P.FACE_PID FROM ZONE_FACE P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_FACE (PID) (SELECT P.FACE_PID FROM ZONE_FACE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT R.REGION_ID FROM ZONE_FACE R,TEMP_ZONE_FACE T WHERE R.FACE_PID= T.PID AND R.REGION_ID!=0 AND R.REGION_ID!=-1);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_LINK (PID) (SELECT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_FACE P, ZONE_FACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.S_NODE_PID FROM ZONE_LINK P, TEMP_ZONE_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT P.E_NODE_PID FROM ZONE_LINK P, TEMP_ZONE_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM ZONE_FACE P,TEMP_ZONE_FACE T WHERE P.FACE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ZONE_FACE_TOPO P, TEMP_ZONE_FACE R WHERE P.FACE_PID = R.PID
DELETE FROM ZONE_FACE P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_FACE T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_FACE_TOPO P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_FACE T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_LINK T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_LINK_KIND P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_LINK T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_LINK_MESH P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_LINK T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_NODE P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_NODE T );
DELETE FROM ZONE_NODE_MESH P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ZONE_NODE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_FACE SELECT FACE_PID FROM ZONE_FACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM ZONE_FACE B WHERE A.FACE_PID = B.FACE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_LINK SELECT LINK_PID FROM ZONE_LINK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM ZONE_LINK B WHERE A.LINK_PID = B.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ZONE_NODE SELECT NODE_PID FROM ZONE_NODE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM ZONE_NODE B WHERE A.NODE_PID = B.NODE_PID);
